name: AVAssetReaderOutput
desc: An abstract class that defines the interface to read media samples from an asset reader.

items.name: var alwaysCopiesSampleData: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the output vends copied sample data.

items.name: var supportsRandomAccess: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the output supports reconfiguring the time ranges it reads.

items.name: func reset(forReadingTimeRanges: [NSValue])
items.desc: Restarts reading with a new set of time ranges.

items.name: func markConfigurationAsFinal()
items.desc: Tells the output that itâ€™s finished reconfiguring time ranges, and allows the asset reader to advance to a completed state.

items.name: func copyNextSampleBuffer() -> CMSampleBuffer?
items.desc: Copies the next sample buffer from the output.

items.name: var mediaType: AVMediaType
items.desc: The media type of samples that the output reads.
